column4: Hi there! My laptop suddenly does not boot from the hard drive anymore, however once inside ubuntu I can use both the windows and ubuntu partition. I reinstalled grub and it worked fine again, then the next day started having the same problem again. Any guesses? (HD is set as a bootable device)
I had people tell me I need a new battery for my cmos, do you think that makes any sense?
nope it sounds like it could be a hard drive issue
